text: You don't have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.
author: Zig Ziglar

text: Success is not a big step in the future, success is a small step taken right now.
author: Jonatan Martensson

text: Success is the product of daily habits - not once-in-a-lifetime transformations.
author: James Clear

text: Every action you take is a vote for the person you wish to become.
author: James Clear

text: The struggle ends when gratitude begins.
author: Neale Donald Walsch

text: You don't learn to walk by following rules. You learn by doing and by falling over.
author: Richard Branson

text: Practice makes comfort. Expand your experiences regularly so every stretch won't feel like your first.
author: Gina Greenlee

text: It doesn't matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
author: Confucius

text: No matter how many mistakes you make or how slow you progress, you are still way ahead of everyone who isn't trying.
author: Tony Robbins

text: The only failure is not trying.
author: Robin S.Sharma

text: The best learning happens in real life with real problems and real people and not in classroom.
author: Charles Handy

text: Motivation is what gets you started. Habit is what keeps you going.
author: Jim Ryun
